column1:
it’s not even one full year of 2020 yet we have:

- iran vs usa
- coronavirus
- kobe bryant’s death

so maybe 2021 will be our year
RT @sanchezcastejon: Spain is coleader in initiatives such as the ACT-Accelerator to achieve equitable access to vaccines, treatments and d…

I mean if you’re sick in the first place and you’re aware that coronavirus is becoming prevalent in the place you’re staying in, then dont travel in hopes that you did not contract the said virus. You’re also risking the health of other people by doing so.
